description: A mysterious girl who was summoned by the human race for salvation, Luna was known as "the sun which is named the moon", and has been dubbed the "Source of Life" â€” a living embodiment for the world. Deemed as a threat, Braiking Boss sends Casshern, Dio, and Leda to assassinate her. Casshern successfully does so, and triggers the destruction of the world.
name: Luna
